title: Once Bytten
description: Former Marine turned ethical hacker James is in a race against time, trying to intercept an illegal shipment of arms from the USA to the war-torn nation of South Sudan. His top suspect? Christian Hoover. After six grueling years of marriage to Christian, Ella has had enough. Escaping from her controlling and possessive husband, she hides in plain sight, carving out a new life in New York - on her terms. A chance encounter with James upsets her carefully bland, but peaceful routine. And then, her husband finds her.With Christian threatening the safety of her friends and family, the irritatingly insistent James offers to help. But Ella cannot afford to believe in coincidences. She must decide if she can trust James or if she will have to give up her freedom to ensure the safety of her loved ones.
author: Scarlett Walters
